decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (01 - Location Plan; 02 - Block Plan; 03 - Existing Plan; 04a - Proposed Plan; 05a - Proposed Elevations and Sections - Received: 25/09/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as '834 Great West Road, Isleworth, TW7 5NG'.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the northern or eastern walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a detached outbuilding in rear garden for use as garage and gym
